class="ocsforge_color_delimiter"| . >><<span class="ocsforge_color_lid"|t>>>>>><<div class="odocwiki_info"|~Build a drawer menu on the left or right of the screen~.
    ~Returns the ~D~O~M element~, and functions to open and close the menu~.
    ~It is also possible to open or close the menu by clicking on a button~,
    and to swipe the menu to close it~.


    ~If <<span class="odocwiki_inlinecode"|opened>> is true ~(false by default~)~, the drawer is initialized in its
    opened state~.


    ~If <<span class="odocwiki_inlinecode"|swipe>> is true ~(default~)~, the user can swipe to open or close the
    drawer~.


    ~If present~, function <<span class="odocwiki_inlinecode"|onclose>> is called just after the drawer is closed~,
    and function <<span class="odocwiki_inlinecode"|onopen>> just before it starts opening~.


    <<span class="odocwiki_inlinecode"|wrap~_close>> and <<span class="odocwiki_inlinecode"|wrap~_open>> can be used to customize calls to <<span class="odocwiki_inlinecode"|close>> and
    <<span class="odocwiki_inlinecode"|open~_>> functions when the drawer closing or opening is triggered~. ~For
    example~, drawer closing can be disabled using <<span class="odocwiki_inlinecode"|wrap~_close>>~.
